00028 #include <stdio.h>

00037 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00038 
00039 int lrs2365_set(int crate, int slot, WORD coeff[18])
00040 /**********************************************************************\
00041    
00042    Description:
00043 
00044    Load the logic matrix of the LRS2365 with 18 coefficients according
00045    to the specifications in the manual. After loading, the matrix
00046    is verified.
00047 
00048 \**********************************************************************/
00049 {
00050    int i, status;
00051    WORD data;
00052 
00053    /* Initialize 2365 */
00054    camc(crate, slot, 0, 9);
00055 
00056    /* Set mode control to zero (front-panel input) */
00057    camo(crate, slot, 3, 16, 0);
00058 
00059    /* Write coefficients */
00060    for (i = 0; i < 18; i++)
00061       camo(crate, slot, 0, 16, coeff[i]);
00062 
00063    /* validate coefficients */
00064    status = SUCCESS;
00065    for (i = 0; i < 18; i++) {
00066       cami(crate, slot, 0, 0, &data);
00067       if (data != coeff[i]) {
00068          cm_msg(MERROR, "lrs2365_set",
00069                 "Error verifying coefficients: should be %d, read %d", coeff[i], data);
00070          status = 0;
00071       }
00072    }
00073 
00074    return status;
00075 }
